instruction: Provide a plan to find the job of your dreams.
input: Dream Job: Computer Scientist at Silicon Valley technology company.
output: My plan to find the job of my dreams is to be up to date with the latest technology news and trends, to attend networking and career fairs, to contact recruiters and send out customized resumes and cover letters, and to make important connections in the industry. I will also use social media and my personal website to showcase my skills and create a presence in the industry. In addition, I will be proactive and get in contact with potential employers and references who can vouch for my skills and tell them about my experience. Finally, I will practice interviewing techniques to ensure I can do the best job possible.
